meanings.meaning: I hear what you are saying

vlive.korean: '진짜 그럴 거야?' "Are you really going to do that?" 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 유부초밥 🦄♥️
vlive.english: "Are you really going to do that?"

vlive.korean: 분명 그럴거야 그래서... It will definitely do that so... 듣기 View video PARK JI HOON : HAPPY MAY BIRTHDAY🎂
vlive.english: It will definitely do that so...

vlive.korean: 근데 왜? - 그럴 거면... But why? - If you're going to do that... 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 유부초밥 🦄♥️
vlive.english: But why? - If you're going to do that...

vlive.korean: [유나의 짱 높은 자신감] 그럴 거거든요~ [YUNA's super high confidence] Yes, we will. 듣기 View video ITZY : [ITZY? ITZY!(있지?있지!)] EP47. 아육대에 있지!
vlive.english: [YUNA's super high confidence] Yes, we will.

vlive.korean: '진짜 그럴 거야?' - '어떻게 나한테 그렇게 할 수가 있어?' "Are you really going to do that?" - "How could you do that to me?" 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 유부초밥 🦄♥️
vlive.english: "Are you really going to do that?" - "How could you do that to me?"

examples.korean: Uh, yeah, I guess so. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 음, 네, 그럴 거예요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Uh, yeah, I guess so. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘He didn’t see me, I guess.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그는 나를 못 봤어. 그럴 거야.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘He didn’t see me, I guess.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘Is he coming?’ ‘I hope so.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그가 오나요?” “그럴 거예요.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Is he coming?’ ‘I hope so.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘Will you be late?’ ‘I expect so.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “늦을 거니?” “아마 그럴 거야.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Will you be late?’ ‘I expect so.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She lost it, just as I said she would. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 내가 그럴 거라고 말한 꼭 그대로 그걸 잃어버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She lost it, just as I said she would. Add to Wordbook
